1.title: Julius Thomas, Carlos Boozer, Dashon Goldson, Derrick Favors
1.plot: Young Hollywood's "Beyond The Athlete" joins Julius Thomas while he trains for the coming NFL season, catches NBA veteran Carlos Boozer walking the runway for his new clothing line, helps NFL Pro Bowler Dashon Goldson get dressed to impress for the ESPY red carpet, and accompanies basketball star Derrick Favors on his first ever photo shoot.

2.title: Marcedes Lewis, Chris Johnson, Greg Jennings, Tyrann Mathieu
2.plot: Young Hollywood goes "Beyond The Athlete" with NFL tight end Marcedes Lewis, who shows off his swanky pad. Then running back Chris Johnson trains at the Unbreakable Performance Center with Jay Glazer. Wide receiver Greg Jennings and his wife Nicole set up shop at Super Bowl. And safety Tyrann Mathieu holds a meet and greet for the fans.

3.title: Golden Tate, Trevor Ariza, Makua Rothman, Phillip Dorsett & Denzel Perryman
3.plot: Young Hollywood goes "Beyond The Athlete" with NFL wide receiver Golden Tate, who takes us to Trump International for a round of golf. Then NBA shooting guard Trevor Ariza puts on his coaching hat for charity. Big wave surfer Makua Rothman shops and sings at RUCA's storefront. Finally, NFL wide receiver Phillip Dorsett and linebacker Denzel Perryman take a break from the draft process at the Young and Reckless show room.

4.title: Paul Rodriguez, Christen Press, Jarvis Landry, Chad Kerley
4.plot: Young Hollywood goes "Beyond The Athlete" with skateboard legend Paul "P-Rod" Rodriguez as he influences a new generation of skaters at the Dew Tour. Then, Women's National Team star forward Christen Press gets glammed up for the Nickelodeon Kids Choice Sports Awards. Miami Dolphins wide receiver Jarvis Landry keeps the ESPYs Red Carpet lit hosting for YH. And X Games Gold Medalist Chad Kerley changes the culture of BMX.

5.title: Cam Newton, Terrell Owens, Jordan Clarkson, Kareem Jackson
5.plot: Young Hollywood goes "Beyond The Athlete" to take a look behind the scenes of NFL MVP quarterback Cam Newton and his new TV show, "All In With Cam Newton". Then, controversial NFL legend Terrell Owens takes on the fashion world with his new clothing line Prototype 81. Meanwhile, rising NBA superstar Jordan Clarkson gets swagged out by celebrity stylist Ashley North. And finally, NFL cornerback Kareem Jackson prepares for the launch of his new fashion line, Fly Guy.

6.title: Rob Gronkowski, Gabby Douglas, Andre Drummond & Jagger Eaton, Nyjah Huston
6.plot: Young Hollywood goes "Beyond The Athlete" with NFL tight end Rob Gronkowski behind the scenes of his Nickelodeon series "Crashletes". Then, we catch up with pro-skateboarder Nyjah Huston as he gets ready to compete at the SLS Super Crown World Championship. Meanwhile, NBA star Andre Drummond films a stunt for skateboarding prodigy Jagger Eaton's show "Jagger Eaton's Mega Life". And finally, Olympic gold medal gymnast Gabby Douglas makes an appearance on Nickelodeon's "Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn".

imdb.plot outline: You root for their team and you know their stats, but how well do you really know your favorite athlete? Young Hollywood invites you to experience life during the off-season for these men and women. Find out who they are and what they love to do when they hang up their jersey, and get to know the person beyond the athlete.
imdb.title: Beyond the Athlete
plot: You root for their team and you know their stats, but how well do you really know your favorite athlete?
